name: Capsule (itch) (Littlebath)
description:
Sector 609 Space station has been hit by a meteor shower. Ben Nelson is the last survivor in the space station. Help him fix the different systems in order to return back home. Solve the puzzles carefully. Your actions have consequences . P.S. the bulb puzzle leads to two endings.

 Controls : Left and right arrow keys to move. "Z" Key to interact. Mouse controls to solve puzzles.
